import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Button from '../../components/UI/Button/Button'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import Input from '../../components/UI/Input/Input'; import '../Cart/Cart.css'; import './Auth.css'; const Auth = (props) => { let errorMessage = false; const [isSignup, setIsSignup] = useState(false); if (props.errorMessage) { errorMessage = props.errorMessage; } return (
  • {errorMessage}

    No Account? Join NodeShop

 ); }; export default Auth;
